sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
discharged from hospital, prison, or the armed forces
, mu dovolijo, da odide iz bolnišnice, zapora ali vojske.

seg.quote: ...from the time of his discharge until his re-arrest.
He is unable to discharge the duties of his office.

sense.def:
To discharge an object or substance
pomeni poslati neki predmet ali snov z nekega kraja;

seg.quote: The city's sewage is discharged into huge lakes.
...the discharge of mercury from industrial premises.

sense.def:
A discharge
je tudi količina neke snovi, ki prihaja z nekega kraja;
